text: Martin H. Kennelly (August 11, 1887 - November 29, 1961) was an American politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1947-1955). He was a member of the Democratic Party. Kennelly was born on August 11, 1887 in Chicago, Illinois.Green, Paul M., and Holli, Melvin G. (1995) The Mayors: The Chicago Political Tradition, Carbondale, Southern Illinois University Press, 127-128 He was never married and had no children. Kennelly died on November 29, 1961 from heart failure, aged 74. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Martin H. Kennelly
